title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 894.6 - Investigation and due diligence required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 894.6 - Investigation and due diligence required

State Regulations

The municipality shall use due diligence to investigate and
assess the technical ability, financial condition, and character of every
applicant and, in particular, to ascertain the operating record and reputation
of any applicant who owns or operates, or whose principals own or operate cable
television systems elsewhere. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
894.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
